ratings.comment: I genuinely enjoyed taking this course. Prof. Wang and her TA Bobby were extremely helpful throughout the semester. While the exams were somewhat challenging and the problem sets were tough, attending the TA's office hours was very helpful in helping me succeed. I would highly recommend taking it if you're prepared to put in the effort.

Nice professor but poor lecturer. Often go off tangent as she's so passionate about microbio, resulting in  important content being covered very fast; she also sometimes explained things unclearly. Assignments content were often not covered in lecture and require understanding outside class. But she's very caring and willing to help you.

I wanted to like this class so badly but could not. She is nice, but lectures are so cryptic and tests are hyper-specific. Canvas was disorganized and communication was suboptimal, as she often relayed incorrect information regarding due dates and exams.
